action.name: Psionic Revitalization
entries: The fragment touches one creature that has 0 hit points in the fragment's space. The target regains 10 hit points, and each creature within 10 feet of the healed creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Squirming Dodge
entries: Until the start of the fragment's next turn, any attack roll made against the fragment has disadvantage, and the fragment makes saving throws with advantage.
